highlights: Used random forests, gradient boosted trees, deep neural networks, logistic regression, and ensembles to predict insider trading from trading patterns of potential suspects.
Designed and implemented deep neural network to identify market manipulation from raw market trades, 90% ROC AUC
Developed best practices for model testing and monitoring with Jupyter notebook based examples
Designed and implemented deep learning based signal detector and classifier
Compared and reported on deep learning approaches benchmarked against classical clustering algorithms for signal identification and classification
Optimized, parallelized, and deployed NLP Keras model
Wrote SQL parser that refactored over 1 million lines of legacy SQL scripts
Designed and wrote real time data processing pipeline
Wrote internal technical guides on parallel processing
Researched models and techniques to simulate physical phenomena of interest to engineers and scientists
Wrote technical specifications of model, algorithm, and graphic interface
Implemented algorithms used for numerical simulations and user interfaces in java
Helped customers create and optimize simulations
American Dental Association Foundation - performed data visualization and image processing with python, named 2nd author on resulting paper
University of Maryland Baltimore County - Reduced run time of quantum computing simulation from 5 days to 50 minutes
Tor - Wrote code to tunnel Iranians through google chat to reach the uncensored internet

projects.name: Convolutional Decision Tree
projects.description: Decision trees are universal approximators just like neural networks. It turns out making decision trees convolutional does not help in the same way it does neural networks, but I had to try!

projects.name: Pseudoinvertible Neural Network
projects.description: Modified deep convolutional neural network classifier to only use [psuedo]invertible transformations. Achieved near SOTA accuracy with approximately half as many parameters.

projects.name: Toy Q Learning
projects.description: Trained two bots to learn to play tic tac toe via Q learning.

projects.name: Semisupervised Learning
projects.description: Experimented with autoencoder based semi supervised clustering. 80% accuracy on 10% labeled mnist data

projects.name: Discrete Exterior Calculus Framework
projects.description: Developed and reported on efficient and parallelized finite elements framework

awards.title: Enhancing the Three-Dimensional Structure of Adherent Gingival Fibroblasts and Spheroids via a Fibrous Protein-Based Hydrogel Cover.
awards.summary: Published with biologists at American Dental Association Foundation

awards.title: Kahler: An Implementation of Discrete Exterior Calculus on Hermitian Manifolds
awards.summary: Independent research and implementation of finite elements framework
